## IPixelBuffer.setAt() method

Writes pixel value at given position. Has no effect if outside of the defined region.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setAt(x: number, y: number, col: P): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> |  |
|  y | <code>number</code> |  |
|  col | <code>P</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
